meanings.definition: A period of one thousand years.
meanings.sent1: The ancient civilization lasted for a millennium.
meanings.sent2: The new technology will shape the next millennium.
meanings.sent3: Celebrating a millennium of friendship, they threw a big party.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom seemed to span a millennium.
meanings.sent5: The majestic oak tree stood for a millennium, witnessing history.

meanings.definition: A period of great happiness or prosperity.
meanings.sent1: The community experienced a millennium of peace and joy.
meanings.sent2: Winning the championship brought a millennium of pride to the team.
meanings.sent3: Their laughter echoed through the room, creating a millennium of happiness.
meanings.sent4: The golden sunset painted the sky with a millennium of beauty.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen, bringing a millennium of comfort.
